text: Anyone experimented with integrating membership areas with DepositFix or another way to automate paid memberships transactions within the HS CMS?
hey <@U26BLKGE4> founder of DepositFix here. Can you provide more details about your usecase?

Hey Denis, essentially the prospect we're talking to wants to have a paid-members only area on their site, but wants members to be able to:

1. Sign up and pay for memberships on their own
2. See different content based on membership level/"product tier"
3. Manage their subscription (membership charge renewal, payment methods, upgrading and downgrading membership levels and cancelation)
All ideally within HS CMS.
Have you manage to get the contact's standar profile/logo image? Is there a property name for that?
We don’t have a formal integration with membership, however, we’ll discover the possibilities
What would be the best email address to reach you about this? I’m at <mailto:denis@depositfix.com|denis@depositfix.com>
